import React,{useState} from 'react' import './Signup.css' import { Button } from '@material-ui/core'; const SignUp = () => { const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ username: '', password: '', name: '', email: '' }) const {username, password, name, email} = userInfo const handleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target alert(`키: ${name}, 밸류: ${value}`) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() } return (<>

Sign Up

Please fill in this form to create an account.

By creating an account you agree to our Terms & Privacy.

) } export default SignUp
